mapper.update: update member_operations set role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_record_id = #{memberRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `operation` = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, role_id, member_id, member_record_id, `operation`, description, create_at from member_operations
